ebb
ebb verb [I]
(WATER)
When the sea or tide ebbs, it moves away from the coast and falls to a lower level.

ebb verb [I]
(FEELING)
If a physical or emotional feeling ebbs, it becomes less strong or disappears: He could feel his strength ebbing (away).
